name: Dream and awake
tagline: A person who work with irregular timetable.
body:
###Welcome to my page
I am a person who don't want to keep a regular timetable. I don't get up too late, however I will sleep in the afternoon and right after supper.

###Why this blog?
This page intends to record every bit of my memory and thoughts. I will update it regularly.

###Who the hell am I?
I am a man who learn mathematics. This simple. I use haskell, that is why my name is Laskell. It is not related to anything else you can find in [github.com](github.com). It is just a new start.

###Contact me
My email is [zhiwudazhanjiangshi@gmail.com](mailto:zhiwudazhanjiangshi@gmail.com). Don't hesitate to contact me if you are interested in mathematics (mostly numerical solutions and geometry) and Haskell.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
